items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies sending WhatsApp messages via the WhatsApp web interface. It enables developers to initiate WhatsApp conversations with pre-filled messages, making it ideal for integrating "Share via WhatsApp" functionality into web applications and facilitating mass message delivery.
items.title: cedibb/whatsapp-swiftsend: Lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies sending WhatsApp messages via the WhatsApp web interface. It enables developers to initiate WhatsApp conversations with pre-filled messages, making it ideal for integrating "Share via WhatsApp" functionality into web applications and facilitating mass message delivery.

items.content_html: Express Clone is a functional clone of the popular Node.js web application framework, Express. This project was created by Agustin Carignano and Mario Herrero, with the aim of providing developers with a lightweight, flexible, and easy-to-use framework for building web applications in Node.js.
